rooms.description: A spacious open-plan area combining living, dining, and kitchen functionalities with sustainable materials and built-in eco-friendly appliances. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the southern facade ensure ample natural light.
The studio area is designed as a flexible living space that doubles as a workspace or relaxation zone. Natural ventilation and ambient lighting are prioritized via floor-to-ceiling windows.
Private bedroom with ample natural light and privacy, positioned according to Vastu principles for a balanced energy flow.

A dedicated library area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that provide serene views of the farm landscape while ensuring optimal light and ventilation. Bookshelves are integrated sustainably with reclaimed wood.
Efficient and eco-friendly bathroom design using water-saving fixtures and natural lighting.

openings.description: Large windows that allow maximum daylight penetration, enhancing energy efficiency.
A welcoming entrance designed to adhere to local building norms and Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
